properties.name: Sample XML

properties.description:
This workflow shows how to use the "XPath Query" activity to extract information from XML-formatted text.

The XPath Query activity shows multiple examples of valid path queries for the sample XML provided with the workflow.

More information about XPath Query and some helpful links can be found in our GitHub documentation at https://cs.co/SXO_docs

Run this workflow and inspect each activity's output carefully.
